name: A Lonely Cabin Trip Demo
description:
You are playing as a hardworking individual that has finally got to take some time of work and social media, to go on a cabin trip to a island all alone, but you don't feel so alone after all...

Headphones are heavily recommended.

It takes around 10-15 minutes to play through.

LMBTo interact/stop interactWASDTo moveSHIFTTo runITo open/close inventoryFFlashlight on/offESCPause menu/settings

Would appreciate your feedback so i can improve this game to a masterpiece when i fully release it!
